articles.description: Harry Potter fans have just discovered something rather shocking about the third Harry Potter movie, Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
articles.content:
By now, you've probably seen every Harry Potter film at least 10 times and think you know all there is to know about the wizarding world. 
But it turns out there's one little detail in the third mov… [+2185 chars]
